explanation: [0-0] In front of a train window, with a pink striped windowsill, stands a coin. Outside the window, green vegetation can be seen, and the sky is grayish-blue. At the top of the screen, there is a 348 km/h sign.
[0-2] Next, as the train moves at high speed, a right hand appears from the bottom of the screen, placing a coin held between the fingers on the windowsill. The scenery outside the window flashes by.

[2-10] Then, the right hand holding the coin slowly places it upright on the windowsill. The hand then releases the coin, and it stands steadily, swaying slightly.
